main.sql:
select cast(Transliter(fr.fio) as varchar(50)) as EngFio, cast(Transliter(fr.town) as varchar(130))as engTown, cast(Transliter(fr.Coach) as varchar(50))as engCoach, (c.date_begin - fr.bithdate)/365 as age, fr.* , r.sname as rname , loc.zr , loc.createtime from finalreport(%IDC%) fr left join Lifter_on_competition loc on loc.id_lifter_compet=fr.loc left join Competit C on c.id_compet=loc.id_compet join range r on r.id_range=c.id_range
%WHERE% order by fr.sex, fr.fio
